name: Size Invaders
description:
This game is a classic arcade-style vertical shoot-em-up bullet hell where you shrink as you lose health, making it easier to dodge bullets. The amount of damage you do and your bullet size also scale with your health, meaning that while you are harder to hit, you take longer to destroy the enemies. You will automatically have access to all the levels, playing through them in order is intended but not required, easy levels are green, medium are yellow, and hard are red. 

--Every level has been completed without taking damage--

Content:
  • 5 levels of varying difficulty
  • 3-5 stages per level
  • 7 types of enemy
  • 1 boss
  • 3 power ups
Controls:

WASD to move around the screen and M1 to fire and ESC to pause/un-pause.
